name: plate
comment: MaNGA Plate Number

name: ifudsgn
comment: MaNGA IFU number

name: plateifu
comment: MaNGA Plate-IFU

name: mangaid
comment: MaNGA ID number

name: versdrp2
comment: DRP Version for RSS Production

name: versdrp3
comment: MNSA Version for Cube Production

name: verscore
comment: mangacore version

name: versutil
comment: idlutils version

name: versprim
comment: MaNGA pre-imaging version

name: platetyp
comment: Plate type (e.g. MaNGA or APOGEE-2\&MaNGA)

name: srvymode
comment: Survey mode (e.g. MaNGA dither, MaNGA stare, APOGEE lead)

name: objra
comment: J2000 RA of object

name: objdec
comment: J2000 Dec of object

name: ifuglon
comment: Galactic longitude of IFU center

name: ifuglat
comment: Galactic latitude of IFU center

name: ifura
comment: J2000 RA of IFU center

name: ifudec
comment: J2000 Dec of IFU center

name: ebvgal
comment: Galactic E(B-V) from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1998)

name: nexp
comment: Total number of science exposures combined

name: exptime
comment: Total exposure time

name: drp3qual
comment: Quality bitmask

name: bluesn2
comment: Total blue $(S/N)^2$ for combined exposures

name: redsn2
comment: Total red $(S/N)^2$ for combined exposures

name: harname
comment: IFU harness name

name: frlplug
comment: Frplug hardware code

name: cartid
comment: Cartridge ID number

name: designid
comment: Design ID number associated with plate

name: cenra
comment: J2000 RA of plate center

name: cendec
comment: J2000 Dec of plate center

name: airmsmin
comment: Minimum airmass across all exposures

name: airmsmed
comment: Median airmass across all exposures

name: airmsmax
comment: Maximum airmass across all exposures

name: seemin
comment: Minimum guider seeing

name: seemed
comment: Median guider seeing

name: seemax
comment: Maximum guider seeing

name: transmin
comment: Minimum atmospheric transparency

name: transmed
comment: Median atmospheric transparency

name: transmax
comment: Maximum atmospheric transparency

name: mjdmin
comment: Minimum MJD across all exposures

name: mjdmed
comment: Median MJD across all exposures

name: mjdmax
comment: Maximum MJD across all exposures

name: gfwhm
comment: Reconstructed FWHM in g-band

name: rfwhm
comment: Reconstructed FWHM in r-band

name: ifwhm
comment: Reconstructed FWHM in i-band

name: zfwhm
comment: Reconstructed FWHM in z-band

name: mngtarg1
comment: manga_target1 bitmask for target selection

name: mngtarg2
comment: manga_target2 bitmask for target selection

name: mngtarg3
comment: manga_target3 bitmask for target selection

name: catidnum
comment: Primary catalog input catalog row number (leading digits of mangaid)

name: plttarg
comment: plateTarget file appropriate for this target

name: manga_tileid
comment: Tile ID for this object

name: nsa_iauname
comment: IAU-style designation based on RA and Dec from NSA

name: ifudesignsize
comment: Allocated IFU survey (0 = 'unallocated')

name: ifutargetsize
comment: Ideal IFU size

name: ifudesignwrongsize
comment: Allocated IFU size if intended IFU size is unavailable

name: z
comment: Redshift from target catalog

name: zmin
comment: Minimum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Primary sample

name: zmax
comment: Maximum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Primary sample

name: szmin
comment: Minimum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Secondary sample

name: szmax
comment: Maximum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Secondary sample

name: ezmin
comment: Minimum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Primary+ sample

name: ezmax
comment: Maximum redshift for which galaxy could have been included in Primary+ sample

name: probs
comment: Probability that a Secondary sample galaxy is included after down-sampling. For galaxies not in the Secondary sample, set to mean down-sampling probability

name: pweight
comment: Volume weight for the Primary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: psweight
comment: Volume weight for the combined Primary and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: psrweight
comment: Volume weight for the combined Primary and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: sweight
comment: Volume weight for the full Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: srweight
comment: Volume weight for the down-sampled Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: eweight
comment: Volume weight for the Primary+ sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: esweight
shortcomment: Weight for Primary+ plus full Secondary
comment: Volume weight for the combined Primary+ and full Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: esrweight
comment: Volume weight for the combined Primary+ and down-sampled Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume-limited sample

name: nsa_field
comment: SDSS imaging field for NSA-selected objects

name: nsa_run
comment: SDSS imaging run for NSA-selected objects

name: nsa_camcol
comment: SDSS imaging camcol for NSA-selected objects

name: nsa_version
comment: NSA version for target selection

name: nsa_nsaid
comment: NSA ID number for v1_0_1 targets

name: nsa_nsaid_v1b
comment: NSA ID number for v1b_0_0_v2 targets

name: nsa_z
comment: Heliocentric redshift according to NSA

name: nsa_zdist
shortcomment: Distance estimate from Willick et al
comment: Distance estimate using peculiar velocity model of Willick et al (1997); multiply by $c/H_0$ for Mpc

name: nsa_sersic_absmag
comment: Absolute magnitude in rest frame bands [FNugriz] based on single-component elliptical Sersic profile fit ($\Omega_m=0.3$, $\Omega_\Lambda=0.7$, $h=1$)

name: nsa_elpetro_absmag
comment: Absolute magnitude in rest frame bands [FNugriz] based on elliptical Petrosian magnitude ($\Omega_m=0.3$, $\Omega_\Lambda=0.7$, $h=1$)

name: nsa_elpetro_amivar
comment: Inverse variance of {\tt nsa_elpetro_absmag}

name: nsa_sersic_mass
comment: Stellar mass from {\tt kcorrect} fit for Sersic fluxes ($\Omega_m=0.3$, $\Omega_\Lambda=0.7$, $h=1$; {\bf use with caution})

name: nsa_elpetro_mass
comment: Stellar mass from {\tt kcorrect} fit for Elliptical Petrosian fluxes ($\Omega_m=0.3$, $\Omega_\Lambda=0.7$, $h=1$; {\bf use with caution})

name: nsa_elpetro_ba
comment: Axis ratio (minor over major) for elliptical apertures in elliptical Petrosian fit

name: nsa_elpetro_phi
comment: Position angle (East of North) for elliptical apertures in elliptical Petrosian fit

name: nsa_extinction
shortcomment: Galactic extinction from SFD98 in FNugriz
comment: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in FNugriz

name: nsa_elpetro_th50_r
comment: 50\% light radius of elliptical Petrosian profile for $r$-band

name: nsa_petro_th50
comment: 50\% light radius of circular Petrosian profile for $r$-band

name: nsa_petro_flux
comment: Circular Petrosian flux for FNugriz bands

name: nsa_petro_flux_ivar
comment: Inverse variance of {\tt nsa_petro_flux}

name: nsa_elpetro_flux
comment: Elliptical Petrosian flux for FNugriz bands

name: nsa_elpetro_flux_ivar
comment: Inverse variance of {\tt nsa_elpetro_flux}

name: nsa_sersic_ba
comment: Axis ratio (minor over major) found for elliptical Sersic fit

name: nsa_sersic_n
comment: Sersic index found for elliptical Sersic fit

name: nsa_sersic_phi
comment: Position angle (East of North) for major-axis orientation found in Sersic fit

name: nsa_sersic_th50
comment: 50\% light radius of elliptical, single-component Sersic fit to $r$-band

name: nsa_sersic_flux
comment: Elliptical Sersic flux for FNugriz bands

name: nsa_sersic_flux_ivar
comment: Inverse variance of {\tt nsa_sersic_flux}

name: manga_cube_mnsa
comment: Set if MNSA cube was attempted

name: wise_coadd_done
comment: Set if WISE coadd was produced

name: dlis_coadd_done
comment: Set if DLIS coadd was produced

name: galex_coadd_empty
comment: Set if GALEX coadd produced with zero flux

name: galex_coadd_done
comment: Set if GALEX coadd produced with non-zero flux

name: manga_cube_done
comment: Set if MNSA cube was produced

name: wise_resampled_done
comment: Set if resampled WISE image was produced

name: dlis_resampled_done
comment: Set if resampled DLIS image was produced

name: galex_resampled_done
comment: Set if resampled GALEX image was produced

name: dap_done
comment: Set if DAP was run for MNSA cube

name: ipipe3d
comment: Index into Pipe3D catalog from Sanchez et al.
